q: `` I asked a successful guy,`` What's the best advice you can give me?'' He said,`` Simon Cowell , know when to leave the fair,'' he said. Even without the Internet and the age of the instanteous image Diana Spencer was, as her brother so poignantly href="http://www.guardian.co.uk/theguardian/2007/may/04/greatspeeches" target="_hplink"> pointed out in his eulogy of her, the most hunted person of the modern age. I have to wonder if mere mortals like the Kardashian sisters and movie star demi-goddesses like Angelina Jolie would have dethroned Diana Spencer over time.
